--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Sandy" <magicquartz@...> wrote:
>
> Strai=
ght Shot and Rattrap arrive at the ready room right on time as promised.  T=
he knew they were in trouble for something the first time they had to repor=
t, told by Leo Prime.  They knew him well, and figured that they'd get a re=
al earfull from him.  But then a second transmission told them that Tucson =
would be talking to them instead.  Straight Shot looks to Rattrap a little =
concerned.  She knew her brother well, and knew the tones of his voice when=
 he was serious about something.  She takes a seat as does Rattrap, who had=
 to have the first word.
> 
> " I'm telln' ya this ain't fair, Straight Sho=
t.  That little go cart started it.  He just had ta open his trap and now w=
e're in serious scrap for somethn' we so did not start!  It stinks like the=
 trash compactor in the garbage bay!"
> 
> Straight Shot sighs.
> 
> " Tell=
 me about it. And the worst part is, Tucson is giving the lecture.  I know =
he's not gonna let anyone off easy, just by the tone of his voice, it sound=
ed serious.  I can't believe we're getting in trouble for sticking up for o=
urselves.  What's so wrong about that?"
> 
> She shrugs, as Rattrap sighs.
=
> 
> " Ya got me Prickles.  Oh yeah, your new nickname.  No offense."
> 
> =
She smiles.
> 
> "Nah, none taken, I like it.  Prickles...  That's a new on=
e." 
> 
> Rattrap tries to muster a smile.
> 
> " Kinda like when I used ta=
 call your brother, Wheels..  Hmm, now I think I better call him Wings.  Th=
ey're big enough. Anyway, I wonder what he's gonna say ta us and what kinda=
 punishments he's got planned. Ya know he's gonna do that, right?"
> 
> Str=
aight Shot nodds.
> 
> "Yup.  Guess we just take what comes."
> 
> They now=
 sit patiently and wait for Wheelie to come in.
>


At this point, Wheelie =
walked over into the briefing room.  Glancing over at Rattrap and then over=
 at Straight Shot, the small Survivor said nothing, merely going ovr to sit=
.

At this point, not seein LEO PRIME or RODIMUS present, he quirked his he=
ad about.

Saying nothing, then going to sit back down as he gazed upon the=
 others and waited for what they had all been called in for, not making con=
versation and staying quiet.
